Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: paired hook maeander pattern at rim; swastika and pendant roundel as filling ornament below, with trace of perhaps an animal.
Curator's comments: 'AΠ' is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 234, no. 130)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. V, no. 15)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0170) (phase 2)
